title: Add soil type filter for plant entries list

requirements.text: Add a UI control in the plant entry list screen that lets the user filter the displayed seed/planting entries by soil type.
acceptanceCriteria: A soil type filter control is visible on the main entries list view (where "Your Seeds" and the grid of entry cards are shown).
The filter options are derived from the current set of loaded entriesâ€™ soilType values (unique, non-empty), plus an "All soil types" option.
Selecting a specific soil type updates the UI to show only entries whose soilType matches the selected value.
Selecting "All soil types" shows all entries again.
When the filter is active, the count text (e.g., "Tracking X seed entries") reflects the number of entries currently shown (post-filter).
If there are no entries, the existing empty state remains unchanged and no filter is shown (or it is disabled in a sensible way).
All user-facing text related to the filter is in English.

constraints: Do not modify files under frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.tsx, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/main.tsx, or anything in frontend/src/components/ui (compose existing UI components instead).
Keep filtering client-side using the already-fetched entries (no new backend APIs required).
nonGoals: Adding backend endpoints for filtered queries.
Adding additional filters (e.g., germination status, date ranges) beyond soil type.
